content: Beth's services are perfectly on point! This one time, I was worried about failing my drivers test, so I went to get a reading from Beth so I knew what to expect, she said I would most likely fail, and I did!!!
She also taught me a lot about the spirit world, and how ghosts work. She told me that, with enough practice, I can also become a medium and protect people!!!
I'm still not good enough though. This one time, the house was haunted, and I tried doing a seance on my own to get rid of it, and the ghost got mad and knocked over a candle and burnt the couch!!!

Thankfully she was able to help me get rid of it with another seance when I asked her, and she told me what I did wrong. We also got Sam to help us because more people helps get rid of ghosts faster!!!
A friend of mine made me do a seance with her and Beth one time when she was afraid we were haunted. It went well, we spoke to the ghost and it went away shortly after.
